text:
ce="preserve">The 1998 Formula One season was the 47th edition of the championship. The champion was Mika Häkkinen in a close battle. Mclaren won the constructor's championship.
Drivers and constructors.
The following teams and drivers competed in the 1998 FIA Formula One World Championship.
Drivers standings.
Driver did not finish the Grand Prix. Driver was classified (ranked) because they finished over 90% of the race.
Constructors standings.
Car did not finish the Grand Prix. Driver was classified (ranked) because they finished over 90% of the race.
